name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Google API Discovery Service
description: This is a repository of google api discovery service APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google API Discovery Service
apis.description: You can use the Google API Discovery Service to build client libraries, IDE plugins, and other tools that interact with Google APIs. It provides a lightweight, JSON-based API that exposes machine-readable metadata about Google APIs.
